attributes.action: Cap the amount of times a person can be re-elected for London Mayor.
attributes.additional_details: I believe the current London Mayor has failed every person throughout London, Knife crime is up, Motorcycle theft is up, Mobile phone theft is up, the list of failings is endless. I believe that the people of London deserve better and deserve change.
attributes.background: I would like the Government/Parliament to debate on whether a cap should be applied on the amount of times a person can be re-elected for London Mayor.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Limit the number of terms an elected mayor can serve 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709729
